div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Feb. 4, 1916. SBOR ZASTUPCU UTULNA A SIROTCINEC

body.p: The meeting of the Sbor Zastupcu Utulna A Sirotcinec (Bohemian Old People's Home and Orphanage Association) was held January 19, 1916.

The secretary, Mr. Ottokar F. Dusek, announced at this meeting total receipts of $3,022.59. In this amount is included a yearly donation, sent by the clerk of the juvenile court, of $132. S. M. Silverman sent $200 for the support of the Kriz children; Bohumil Hladky, B. Klecka, and Zuzana Devecka each donated $20 for the support of children of our institution. All these donations are included in the grand total of receipts. The expenditures total $1,862.87, in which is included the sum of $1,147.14 for the building of a home for our orphans.

May I ask our kind patrons and well-wishers for the donation of a laundry stove, and carpets for our offices, and will our kind ladies donate white material suitable for the making of window curtains?
....Finally, the Sbor Zastupcu Utulna A Sirotcinec thank you for the goods and moneys you have donated for the good cause.
